usage: obal source [-h] [-v] [-e EXTRA_VARS] [--step] [-t TAGS]
                   [--skip-tags SKIP_TAGS]
                   package [package ...]

Setup sources for a package

When using git annex we only store a reference to a the actual source. This command retrieves the sources from the remote. These are usually tarballs or gems.

positional arguments:
  package               the package to build

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -v, --verbose         verbose output

advanced arguments:
  -e EXTRA_VARS, --extra-vars EXTRA_VARS
                        set additional variables as key=value or YAML/JSON, if
                        filename prepend with @
  --step                interactive: confirm each task before running
  -t TAGS, --tags TAGS  only run plays and tasks tagged with these values
  --skip-tags SKIP_TAGS
                        only run plays and tasks whose tags do not match these
                        values
